SELECT
,(st_distance(point(cast(latitude as decimal(10,6)),cast(longitude as decimal(10,6))),point(cast(#{params.latitude} as decimal(10,6)),cast(#{params.longitude} as decimal(10,6))))*111195/1000 ) as jl FROM itcast_core_org
1 = 1
AND city_id = #{params.cityId}
AND (address LIKE concat('%',#{params.keyword},'%') or name LIKE concat('%',#{params.keyword},'%') or abbreviation LIKE concat('%',#{params.keyword},'%') or contract_number LIKE concat('%',#{params.keyword},'%') )
order by jl asc
